scripts.test-all: xpm run test-unit && xpm run test-sample
scripts.test-unit: xpm run build-unit && xpm run execute-unit
scripts.test-sample: xpm run build-sample && xpm run execute-sample
scripts.build-unit: mkdir -p build && cp -fv build.ninja build && ninja -C build -v unit-test
scripts.build-sample: mkdir -p build && cp -fv build.ninja build && ninja -C build -v sample-test
